rule: The output can contain multiple part of speech tags or various responses.
validityText:
The input consists of a sentence "Turn the volume down." followed by the word "volume". According to the input specification, the sentence and the word must be clearly separated by either punctuation or whitespace. In this case, they are separated by a period. The sentence "Turn the volume down." contains the word "volume", which is also the word specified after the sentence. The word "volume" does not contain any punctuation. Therefore, the input complies with the input specification.

OK
